BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of community hiring and compensation standards for city assisted housing development projects
Items.MatterName: Establishment of community hiring and compensation standards for city assisted housing development projects.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.10225/S.9376, also known as The Good Jobs Guarantee Act, which would establish certain workforce training programs and increase employment opportunities for New Yorkers.
